product_name: AMC Sea Kayaking Along the Mid-Atlantic Coast
long_description: Open up a new world of exploration as you discover the beauty of America's coastal region- ideal for veterans and beginners alike. Author: Tamsin Venn. Softcover; 204 pages; black-and-white photos and maps. Appalachian Mountain Club Books; copyright 1994. Details coastal paddling adventures from New York to Chesapeake Bay. Provides all you need to know to set off on 30 fun and exciting sea kayaking adventures. Special features include: detailed descriptive accounts of each route, with local history, wildlife, ecology, scenic highlights, and more. Supplies maps and National Oceanic and Atmospheric Association (NOAA) chart references. Covers access, parking, and launch/landing spots; trip mileages; campsites; tidal ranges, currents, caution areas, weather, equipment and safety tips.
short_description: Open up a new world of exploration as you discover the beauty of America's coastal region- ideal for veterans and beginners alike.
